wikipedia_page.main: Kenneth Oxford (14 November 1929 – 6 August 1993) was an English footballer. A goalkeeper, he played 296 league games in an 18-year career in the Football League. He spent time with Manchester City, Norwich City, Derby County, Doncaster Rovers, Port Vale, and Boston United.
